text:
<@U05TKF2G5L3> I just copied the code from here, added the TOKEN, pasted it in the custom code action in the workflow, but got an error 400

what should I do to make it work?

```curl --request POST \
  --url <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/line_items> \
  --header 'authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "associations": [
    {
      "types": [
        {
          "associationCategory": "HubSpot_DEFINED",
          "associationTypeId": 0
        }
      ],
      "to": {
        "id": "string"
      }
    }
  ],
  "properties": {
    "name": "string",

  }
}'```

Hi Dor, so the “cURL” version of the code will only work in your terminal as a shell script, and HubSpot’s custom coded actions will only run Node or Python. You’ll want to use one of those versions from the documentation.

anyone else getting network errors when trying to test custom code actions? I'm also having a weird problem where the code thats displayed isn't the same as the code that is attempting to be tested (when it actually goes through

hmmm a bunch of us are getting this error across different accounts

```{"status":"error","message":"Action cannot be completed until pending action completes. See <https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/coming-soon-expansion-of-aws-lambda-states-to-all-functions/>","correlationId":"e84cb7f3-f7c1-4582-b0e1-263070bc045e","errors":["[functionName=1ce100f3-49f6-40a9-9a8c-53f872906349] Received exception while waiting on function update: java.util.concurrent.CompletionException: software.amazon.awssdk.core.exception.SdkClientException: The waiter has exceeded the max wait time or the next retry will exceed the max wait time + PT5S"]}```
<@UQNEXHW14> any idea if theres downtime by chance with CCAs today

Our production homepage is a blank white screen with modules failing to load. Our last react build failed to deploy: An uncategorized error occurred while deploying sub deploy `c48b1313-b71c-47a3-b9bf-b25ed03379a7`. Try re-deploying, or contact HubSpot for support and provide this identifier `6b4a2545-405d-4af6-898f-c9acb227db54`. Rolled back to a previous build from last week I know works. Looks like I can get it to load in an incognito tab if I Decline cookies. Accepting causes the white screen. Other routes are working. Just all around weird behavior on their end today maybe?
